2.verse: “See, I will make you small ( G ) among the nations;

3.verse: The pride ( H ) of your heart has deceived you,

4.verse: Though you soar like the eagle

6.verse: But how Esau will be ransacked,

7.verse: All your allies ( O ) will force you to the border;

9.verse: Your warriors, Teman, ( R ) will be terrified,

10.verse: Because of the violence ( S ) against your brother Jacob, ( T )

11.verse: On the day you stood aloof

12.verse: You should not gloat ( X ) over your brother

13.verse: You should not march through the gates of my people

14.verse: You should not wait at the crossroads

15.verse: “The day of the Lord is near ( AF )

16.verse: Just as you drank ( AH ) on my holy hill, ( AI )

17.verse: But on Mount Zion will be deliverance; ( AL )

19.verse: People from the Negev will occupy

20.verse: This company of Israelite exiles who are in Canaan

21.verse: Deliverers ( AW ) will go up on  Mount Zion
